buildup.text: Founders face a unique cocktail: isolation, uncertainty, identity fusion with their company, and pressure.

discovery.text: A study by Michael Freeman found founders are twice as likely to suffer depression than the general public.

twist.text: Asking for help feels like weakness in startup culture. Founders perform wellness while suffering privately.

climax.text: After losing two friends to suicide, Brad Feld became a vocal advocate for founder mental health support.

punchline.text: Your startup can be restarted. You can't.
